title: SHARP SMC0760KW Compact Oven with Removable 10" Carousel Turntable, Cubic Feet, 700 Watt Countertop Microwave, 0.7 CuFt, White
description: SMC0760KW Compact 0.7 cu. Ft. Microwave is ideal for snacks, beverages, frozen meals and reheating. Its small footprint fits just about anywhere, while its roomy 10" carousel turntable is big enough for a full-size dinner plate. Glossy finish with scratch-resistant glass door complements your style
